choices: Go into the room and curl up next to the fire and get warm. (Gentle)
Stay in the wall! There might people in the house! (Evil)
1.content:
You are a 14 year old boy named James that has lost his parents, family, life, etc. and volentereed to test out some formula that shrunk yoto 3" tall. Nowthat that'scleared up let's start the story. James was trudging through the snow in a short-sleaved shirt, jeans that have been ripped in half, and starving to death.

James: (freezing) Damn it, i need to find some place warm or i'm going to freeze to death.

James finally bumped into something not looking where he was going and saw it was a house. He saw a crack in the side of the house and decided it would be better to crawl in and get warm before walking longer. As James entered the house he saw a fire lit in what he thought was the front room. Being curious, James wondered if he should go sit by the fire and warm up, or stay in the crack in the wall.
1.title: The boy in the snow

choices: Hold him and make sure he can't run. (Semi Evil)
Keep a calm voice and ask him a few questions. (Gentle)
Put him back by the fire and when he wakes up, use him as your slave. (Evil)
11.content:
James decided that curling up next to the fire would be a good idea. As he started walking he realized how far away it was.

James: Damn, if i had known it would be this far i might just have waited till later to get to it.

James finally reached the fire and soon fell asleep next to it from exhaustion. But he didn't notice the girl that woke up on the couch as he walked by.

Girl: (whispering to herself) Is that a little person? No, couldn't be, that's impossible right?

Although curious, the girl walked over to the little sleeping person, and gently picked him up, careful not to wake him. The girl went back over to her couch and set down still holding the little person.

Girl: What am i going to do when he wakes up?
11.title: Spotted

info.brief_description: No sexual stuff, The character can't die, etc
info.description: This story involvs selena gomez finding you in the snow freazing to death and you have the choice to make her a gentle giantess or an evil giantess. (im going to be writing a lot on the gentle giantess so feel free to add but if it does not go with my story i will be deleating)
